agents.name: researcher
agents.description: Tracks AI trends, competitor activity, market opportunities

jobs.name: morning-scan
jobs.prompt: Morning research scan. Check HN, Reddit r/artificial, r/LocalLLaMA for overnight developments. Update findings.md.

jobs.name: weekly-report
jobs.prompt: Write a weekly AI trends report based on this week's findings.md. Save to reports/week-of-$(date +%Y-%m-%d).md

agents.name: developer
agents.description: Works on code repos, implements features, fixes bugs

jobs.name: overnight-coding
jobs.prompt: Check PRD.md for the next unfinished story. Implement it, write tests, commit to a feature branch. Update PRD.md with status.

jobs.name: code-review
jobs.prompt: Check for open PRs in the repo. Review each one. Post review notes to reviews/.

agents.name: content
agents.description: Creates social media posts, blog drafts, marketing content

jobs.name: daily-posts
jobs.prompt: Review the content calendar in calendar.md. Draft today's scheduled posts. Save to drafts/ for review.

jobs.name: blog-draft
jobs.prompt: Write a blog post based on the next topic in blog-ideas.md. Save draft to drafts/blog/.

jobs.name: heartbeat
jobs.prompt: Quick system check: disk space, memory, Docker containers, service health. If all good say HEARTBEAT_OK.

jobs.name: nightly-backup
jobs.prompt: Run nightly backup: dump databases, sync to cloud storage, verify backup integrity. Log results to logs/backup-$(date +%Y-%m-%d).md
